entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
